address.whyInfo: The address will be used as the starting point of your trips.

terms.accept: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our

userExists.email: User already registered with this email, please login
userExists.google: User already registered with Google, please login with Google

EmailConfirmed.title: Email confirmed
EmailConfirmed.message: Your email has been successfully confirmed, now you can create trips and invite friends to join.
EmailConfirmed.inProgressMessage: We are confirming your email, please wait...
EmailConfirmed.errorMessage: Error confirming your email, please try again later.

ResetPassword.title: Reset password
ResetPassword.message: We have sent an email with instructions to reset your password. Check your inbox.
ResetPassword.errorMessage: Error resetting your password, please try again later.

subtitle.completeProfile: Make the necessary changes to complete your profile and create trips.

message.deleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
message.deleteTrip: Are you sure you want to delete this trip? This action is irreversible.
message.incompleteProfileCep: You need to fill in your profile with name, country, state, city, and ZIP code as in the example below:
message.incompleteProfileEmailValidation: To create a trip, you need to confirm your email. Check your inbox and click the confirmation link. If you did not receive the email, click the button below to resend. After that, you must log out and log in again.

activityDesc.transport: Covers air travel, train travel, bus travel, car rental, airport to hotel transfer, use of local public transport (subway, bus, taxi).
activityDesc.accommodation: Involves check-in and check-out at the hotel or inn, as well as changing accommodation during the trip.
activityDesc.food: Includes meals such as breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and coffees, visits to local restaurants, and gastronomic experiences such as cooking classes and tastings.
activityDesc.tour: Includes sightseeing tours (city tour, guided tours), visits to museums and art galleries, visits to tourist attractions (monuments, squares, parks), outdoor activities (hiking, beaches, national parks), sports and recreational activities (skiing, diving, cycling), and shopping at local markets and souvenir shops.
activityDesc.others: Activities that do not fit into other categories.

password.pattern: Password must be at least 6 characters

terms.required: You must accept the Terms of Service

Error.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: Account already exists with a different credential
Error.auth/too-many-requests: Too many requests. Try again later
Error.auth/provider-already-linked: Provider already linked to this account

Trip.inviteInfo: Click on this card to plan your next trip ✈️

title.alias: Give a nickname to your trip
title.anythingElseToSayAboutActivity: Anything else to say about this activity?
title.activityTimeChoose: Choose the date and time of the activity

desc.whichCountryWillYouVisit: Choose the country you will visit
desc.whenWillYouTravel: Choose the start and end date of your trip
desc.alias: Give a nickname to your trip
desc.tripIdentifier: Give a name to identify this trip, such as the cities or regions you plan to visit. Maximum of 35 characters.

password.reset: You need to fill in all password-related fields to reset it

welcome.subject: Welcome to TripHold
welcome.description: With TripHold, you can add, edit, and delete your trips and activities easily. Everything is organized in a schedule to facilitate your planning.
welcome.help: If you need help, contact our support.
welcome.signature: We are here to help at every step of your journey! Have a good trip and enjoy your adventures with TripHold.

confirm.subject: Confirm your email
confirm.instructions: Please click the button below to confirm your email.
confirm.help: If you need help, contact our support.
confirm.signature: We are here to help at every step of your journey with TripHold.

invite.subject: You have been invited to a trip
invite.message: invited you to join the trip
invite.description: Click the button below to accept the invitation and start organizing your trip with TripHold.
invite.help: If you need help, contact our
invite.signature: We are here to help at every step of your journey with TripHold.

reset.subject: Reset password on TripHold
reset.message: We received a request to reset your password on TripHold. Click the button below to reset your password.
reset.help: If you did not request a password reset, contact our
reset.signature: We are here to help at every step of your journey with TripHold.
